member.name: M:_2_1_1.Program.Fine(System.Int32)
member.summary: A static method that checks, if x is divisible by each of it's digits and by the sum of all those digits.

member.name: M:_2_1_1.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Main class, prints all the numbers from 1 to 100000 that satisfy the condition.
